QVM: Quaternions, Vectors, Matrices

del_row

#include <boost/qvm/map_mat_mat.hpp>

namespace boost
{
    namespace qvm
    {
        template <int R>
        -unspecified-return-type- del_row();
    }
}

The expression del_row<R>(m) returns a view proxy that looks like the matrix m with row R deleted.

See also: boost/qvm/map_mat_mat.hpp
